results.idea: EPS estimate momentum vs reported EPS
results.description: Compare short-term momentum of EPS estimates to recently reported EPS. Applied SUGGESTION1 (used 2 fields est_eps and anl4_epsr_value). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). Coverage for both >0.6 so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3 skipped). Used high userCount fields (SUGGESTION4). Kept implementation short (<=7 operators, 2 datafields) per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.78

results.idea: Estimate revision acceleration normalized by number of estimates
results.description: Detect rapid estimate revisions relative to estimate count. Used est_eps and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Count has high coverage so no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing fields with many users. Kept simple per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.74

results.idea: Consensus divergence: stddev of EPS estimations vs mean
results.description: Measure disagreement: higher stddev relative to mean can predict dispersion-driven moves. Used anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (std) and anl4_qf_az_eps_mean (mean) per SUGGESTION1. std coverage ~0.57 (below 0.6) so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 considered by picking well-used fields. Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Estimate revision persistence (IR over revisions)
results.description: Use time-series IR of estimate changes to find persistent upward revisions. SUGGESTION1: est_eps and anl4_epsr_mean used. Both have good userCounts. No vector fields (SUGGESTION2). Fields coverage >0.6 so no ts_backfill. Kept <=7 ops. Confidence: 0.72

results.idea: EBIT estimate surprise momentum
results.description: Compare short-term changes in EBIT estimates vs announced EBIT to catch revisions vs actuals. SUGGESTION1 used est_ebit and anl4_ebit_value. Both high-usage. No ts_backfill needed. Simple implementation per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.75

results.idea: EBITDA cross-sectional zscore of estimate revisions
results.description: Cross-sectionally rank recent EBITDA estimate changes to pick winners. Used est_ebitda and anl4_ebitda_value (SUGGESTION1). High userCount fields selected (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill. Applied zscore for cross-sectional normalization. Confidence: 0.73

results.idea: High analyst dispersion but rising mean (contrarian signal)
results.description: Target cases where stddev large but mean is rising — crowd uncertainty with improving consensus. Used anl4_qf_az_dts_spe and anl4_qf_az_eps_mean (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill to stddev because coverage ~0.57 (SUGGESTION3). Confidence moderate. Kept short. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Estimate downgrade signal from previous-estimate gap
results.description: Compare previous estimate to current mean; big negative gaps predict underperformance. Used anl4_dez1afv4_preest and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). previous field coverage ~0.967 so no ts_backfill. Respected KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence: 0.70

results.idea: Surprise-to-Dispersion ratio
results.description: Divide reported EPS surprise by estimate stddev to prefer predictable beats. Used anl4_af_eps_value (actual) and anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (std). Applied ts_backfill to std (coverage <0.6). SUGGESTION4 observed. Implementation compact. Confidence: 0.76

results.idea: Estimate momentum scaled by analyst count
results.description: Fast-rising estimates with growing number of analysts indicate stronger signal. Used ts_delta(est_eps,30) and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Count coverage high — no backfill. SUGGESTION4 used. Short implementation. Confidence: 0.77

results.idea: Guidance gap: guidance midpoint vs consensus estimate
results.description: Compare guidance value to consensus estimate to identify potential beats. Used guidance_estimate_value and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). guidance_estimate_value coverage ~0.58 so applied ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Cashflow strength vs free cash flow estimates
results.description: Compare announced cashflow from operations to mean FCF estimates; divergence indicates operational surprise. Used cash_flow_from_operations and est_fcf (SUGGESTION1). est_fcf coverage ~0.577 so applied ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Rising CAPEX with falling EPS estimates (risk signal)
results.description: Detect rising capex estimate against falling EPS consensus. Used anl4_capex_value and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). capex coverage ~0.659 (ok). No ts_backfill. Simplicity maintained. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Analyst count jump predictability
results.description: Large increase in number of estimates can signal news; use anl4_ptp_number and ts_delta(est_eps). SUGGESTION1 applied. anl4_ptp_number userCount high. Coverage ~0.732 so no ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Reported EBIT surprise scaled by estimate volatility
results.description: EBIT actual minus mean estimate, scaled by ebit std to favor reliable surprises. Used anl4_ebit_value and anl4_ebit_std (SUGGESTION1). ebit_std coverage ~0.469 (<0.6) so applied ts_backfill. Kept short. Confidence: 0.74

results.idea: Dividend estimate momentum
results.description: Rising dividend estimates indicate cash return strength. Used anl4_qfv4_div_mean and anl4_af_div_value (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; no ts_backfill needed for the two. Kept to 2 datafields. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Free cash flow per share (FCFPS) estimate momentum
results.description: Momentum in FCFPS estimates vs reported FCFPS. Used est_fcf_ps and free_cash_flow_per_share (SUGGESTION1). Both lowish coverage; applied ts_backfill to est_fcf_ps (SUGGESTION3). Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: High stddev but rising earnings (mean/std momentum)
results.description: Prefer names with rising earnings mean but lowering stddev (consensus converging). Used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean and anl4_qfv4_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). std coverage ~0.723; used ts_backfill conservatively on std. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Broker revisions intensity (upper vs lower count)
results.description: Use number of upper vs lower estimates to detect net analyst bullishness. Used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and anl4_adxqfv110_down (SUGGESTION1). Both have good userCount and coverage ~0.6979. No backfill. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Pretax income estimate momentum vs reported pretax
results.description: Compare momentum of pretax estimate vs reported pretax income. Used est_ptp and pretax_income_reported_value (SUGGESTION1). est_ptp coverage ~0.7527. No backfill. Simplicity kept. Confidence: 0.71

results.idea: Sales estimate dispersion vs mean growth
results.description: High dispersion and rising median sales can indicate upward revaluation potential. Used sales_estimate_standard_deviation and median_sales_estimate (SUGGESTION1). Std coverage ~0.7259, median coverage 1.0. No backfill. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Estimate z-score squeeze: mean near recent min/max
results.description: Find estimates that are locally high relative to their recent range. Used ts_scale on est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Single field approach but still uses time-series operator. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Rapid analyst sentiment flip (buy vs sell counts)
results.description: Use anl4_buy and anl4_under to detect quick sentiment shifts (SUGGESTION1). Both have decent userCount/coverage ~0.6243. No backfill needed. Kept ≤2 fields. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Earnings per share revision vs reported EPS (lagged)
results.description: Compare recent est_eps revisions to the reported EPS to detect leading signals. Used ts_returns on est_eps and anl4_af_eps_value (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage; no backfill. Confidence: 0.72

results.idea: Analyst forecast concentration (number of forecasts vs stddev)
results.description: High forecast count but low std suggests strong consensus that may lead to larger moves on surprises. Used anl4_qfv4_eps_number and anl4_qfv4_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill to std if needed. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Broker attention spike preceding positive revisions
results.description: Use broker-related field anl4_baz1v110_person (Broker Id changes) versus est_eps delta. Broker fields used as proxy for attention (SUGGESTION1). Broker coverage ~0.715; no backfill. Confidence moderate. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Net debt guidance vs actual net debt (surprise signal)
results.description: Difference between guidance and actual net debt can affect valuations. Used min_net_debt_guidance and net_debt_actual_value (SUGGESTION1). Guidance coverage 1.0, actual ~0.388 so applied ts_backfill to actual. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Capex guide vs realized capex momentum
results.description: Compare capex guidance to announced capex to find surprises. Used max_capital_expenditure_guidance and capital_expenditure_reported_value (SUGGESTION1). Guidance coverage 1.0; reported coverage ~0.659 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Rapid change in forecast type flags (new vs revision) predicts volatility
results.description: Use anl4_epsr_flag and anl4_fcf_flag to detect bursts of activity. These are flags; use days_from_last_change to quantify recency (SUGGESTION1). Flags have high coverage (>0.8) so no backfill. Confidence conservative. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Free cash flow actual vs mean estimate surprise
results.description: Actual FCF minus mean estimate highlights operational surprises. Used anl4_fcf_value and anl4_fcf_mean (SUGGESTION1). fcf_value coverage ~0.5288 so applied ts_backfill to fcf_value. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Sales guidance beat likelihood (median vs guidance)
results.description: Compare median sales estimate to sales guidance value. Used median_sales_estimate and sales_guidance_value_quarterly (SUGGESTION1). guidance quarterly coverage ~0.326 (low) so applied ts_backfill. Kept short. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Rising shareholder equity vs decreasing net debt (balance-sheet improvement)
results.description: Compare shareholders_equity_actual_value and net_debt_actual_value to find strengthening balance sheets. Both fields present; net_debt_actual_value low coverage so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Earnings revision breadth: proportion of brokers upping estimates
results.description: Use anl4_ady_pu (upper count) vs anl4_ady_high (highest estimate count) to measure breadth. Both fields have good coverage ~0.7196. Used SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Cash flow from operations surprise normalized by sales
results.description: Normalize CFO surprise by sales to scale across firm sizes. Used cash_flow_from_operations and actual_sales_value_annual (SUGGESTION1). Sales coverage high. No backfill required. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Analyst volatility: num of upper + lower revisions change
results.description: Sum of upper and lower estimation counts delta indicates turbulence. Used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and anl4_adxqfv110_down (SUGGESTION1). Coverage good; no backfill. Simple implementation. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Estimate mean acceleration (second derivative)
results.description: Use acceleration of est_eps (ts_delta of ts_delta) to find inflection points. Single field est_eps used (SUGGESTION1 minimal). Coverage high; no backfill. Keeps operators low. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: EBITDA mean vs capex trend (profitability vs investment)
results.description: Rising EBITDA estimates with falling capex estimates are favorable. Used est_ebitda and anl4_capex_value (SUGGESTION1). capex coverage ok. No backfill. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Earnings surprise persistence: repeat beats over quarters
results.description: Count recent beats using anl4_af_eps_value vs est_eps; use ts_sum of beat flags. SUGGESTION1 applied. Used if_else and ts_sum. Fields have good coverage. Confidence: 0.73

results.idea: Estimate vs guidance convergence (mean - guidance)
results.description: Large divergence narrowing over time indicates guidance being validated. Used est_eps and guidance_estimate_value (SUGGESTION1). guidance coverage ~0.5848 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Free cash flow momentum scaled by shares outstanding guidance
results.description: FCF momentum per share signals cash return growth. Used est_fcf and max_shares_outstanding_guidance (SUGGESTION1). shares guidance coverage 1.0; est_fcf low so ts_backfill used. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Earnings z-score conditioned on analyst flag recency
results.description: Boost signals when flag recently changed: combine zscore(est_eps) with days_from_last_change(anl4_epsr_flag). Applied SUGGESTION1. Flag coverage high so no backfill. Respect KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.70

results.idea: Large guided dividend increase vs estimate
results.description: Compare dividend guidance to dividend estimate mean; large positive deltas suggest upward repricing. Used dividend_max_guidance_quarterly and anl4_qfv4_div_mean (SUGGESTION1). guidance coverage 1.0. No backfill. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: High broker rating value vs estimate changes
results.description: Use anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue against est_eps delta to capture rating-driven moves (SUGGESTION1). Rating field coverage ~0.5327 so applied ts_backfill. Kept ops <=7. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Sales estimate momentum vs SGA trend
results.description: Rising sales estimates with falling SGA estimates may indicate margin expansion. Used median_sales_estimate and est_sga (SUGGESTION1). est_sga coverage ~0.5121 so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Consensus upgrade density: upper count relative to total estimates
results.description: Ratio of upper estimations to total gives density of upgrades. Used anl4_basicconqfv110_pu and anl4_basicconqfv110_numest (SUGGESTION1). Coverage good ~0.7262. No backfill. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Guidance tightness: max-min guidance spread
results.description: Narrow guidance spread indicates confidence; use anl4_afv4_maxguidance and anl4_afv4_minguidance (SUGGESTION1). Both coverage ~0.6994-0.6994. No backfill. Simple and short. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Earnings zscore cross-sectional with winsorize
results.description: Robust cross-sectional zscore of reported EPS to limit outliers. Used anl4_af_eps_value (SUGGESTION1) and winsorize for outlier control. Coverage high; SUGGESTION4 respected. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Estimate gap persistence: difference between mean and median estimates
results.description: Large mean > median may signal skewed positive expectations. Used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean and anl4_qfv4_median_eps (SUGGESTION1). Both coverage 1.0. No backfill needed. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Broker consensus shift speed: days_since_flag_change * estimate delta
results.description: Multiply days_from_last_change(anl4_ptp_flag) with ts_delta(est_eps) to find recent active changes with strong momentum (SUGGESTION1). Flags have high coverage; no backfill. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Earnings quality: adjusted net income surprises vs reported earnings
results.description: Compare adjusted net income guidance (min/max) to reported eps to detect quality gaps. Used est_netprofit_adj and anl4_af_eps_value (SUGGESTION1). est_netprofit_adj coverage ~0.7731. No backfill. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Estimate breadth across financial items (count of non-NaN estimates)
results.description: Use group-like proxy: anl4_basicconltv110_numest (num estimates) as breadth measure vs est_eps delta. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage ~0.7004. No group operator used to respect KEEP_IN_MIND3. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Reported EBITDA vs mean estimate momentum
results.description: EBITDA reported minus estimate momentum indicates operational surprise. Used anl4_ebitda_value and est_ebitda (SUGGESTION1). Both have reasonable coverage. No backfill. Confidence: 0.71

results.idea: Cashflow per share consensus breakout
results.description: Detect sudden jumps in cashflow per share estimates using ts_arg_max on est_cashflow_ps or af_cfps_value. Used est_cashflow_ps and anl4_af_cfps_value (SUGGESTION1). est field low coverage so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Stock option expense guidance vs actual
results.description: Large deviation in stock option expense guidance may indicate dilution; compare min_stock_option_expense_guidance and stock_option_expense_max_guidance_qtr (SUGGESTION1). Guidance fields coverage 1.0. Confidence: 0.50

results.idea: Momentum in number of analysts covering (attention proxy)
results.description: Use anl4_ptp_number growth as attention proxy and combine with est_eps momentum (SUGGESTION1). Both fields have good coverage. Kept ≤2 fields. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Earnings surprise weighted by estimate count
results.description: Weight EPS surprise by number of estimates to prioritize widely-followed beats. Used anl4_af_eps_value and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence: 0.72

results.idea: Rapid decrease in stddev indicating fast convergence
results.description: ts_delta of stddev of estimations captures fast convergence (SUGGESTION1). Used anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (std) and applied ts_backfill since coverage ~0.571. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Estimate mean vs tangible book value per share
results.description: Compare earnings momentum to changes in book value per share as value overlay. Used est_eps and book_value_per_share_reported_value (SUGGESTION1). book value coverage ~0.5245 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Free cash flow surprise scaled by EBITDA
results.description: Normalize FCF surprise by EBITDA to find cash conversion quality. Used anl4_fcf_value and anl4_ebitda_value (SUGGESTION1). ebitda coverage ~0.8133, fcf value ~0.5288 so backfilled. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Sales estimate acceleration relative to SGA ratio
results.description: Compare sales estimate acceleration to SGA trend: median_sales_estimate and selling_general_admin_expense (SUGGESTION1). SGA coverage ~0.6346 so no backfill required. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: High reported pretax vs low guidance (positive surprise candidate)
results.description: Compare reported pretax income to min pretax guidance to find firms beating conservative guidance. Used pretax_income_reported_value and min_pretax_profit_guidance (SUGGESTION1). guidance coverage 1.0. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Rapid changes in broker recommendation counts
results.description: Use anl4_buy, anl4_hold, anl4_under pairwise to find swift sentiment flips. To keep two fields limit, used anl4_buy and anl4_under (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ~0.6243. No backfill. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Earnings surprise signal filtered by volatility
results.description: Filter EPS surprise by recent return volatility; favor surprises in low-vol stocks. Used anl4_af_eps_value and ts_std_dev(est_eps,30) (SUGGESTION1). std operator counts as one; applied ts_backfill if est low. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Estimate mean relative to tangible book momentum
results.description: Combine anl4_qfv4_eps_mean with anl4_bvps_mean to spot earnings growth with rising book value per share. Both fields coverage ~0.65-0.7. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Analyst dispersion decline preceding EPS beats
results.description: Detect when stddev falls quickly while mean rises: anl4_qf_az_dts_spe and anl4_qf_az_eps_mean used (SUGGESTION1). Backfilled std due to moderate coverage. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Free cash flow per share vs dividend guidance
results.description: Higher FCFPS relative to dividend guidance may allow dividend increases. Used free_cash_flow_per_share and dividend_min_guidance_value (SUGGESTION1). dividend guidance coverage 1.0; free cash flow coverage low so backfilled. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Estimate momentum conditioned on broker count (attention)
results.description: Multiply est_eps momentum by number of brokers (anl4_baz1v110_person) to favor widely covered moves. SUGGESTION1 applied; broker field coverage ~0.7154. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Sales surprise per analyst (surprise / num estimates)
results.description: Normalize sales surprise by number of estimates to find per-analyst conviction. Used actual_sales_value_annual and sales_estimate_count (SUGGESTION1). Count coverage 1.0. No backfill. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Guidance volatility: ts_std_dev of guidance values
results.description: High guidance volatility may precede large moves. Used guidance_estimate_value and ts_std_dev (SUGGESTION1). guidance coverage ~0.5848 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Rapid share count guidance changes vs EPS
results.description: Changes in basic shares guidance can dilute EPS; compare basic_shares_max_guidance_qtr to est_eps momentum (SUGGESTION1). Shares guidance coverage 1.0. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Analyst estimate skewness proxy (mean - median)/std
results.description: Use mean and median of EPS and std to capture skew. Used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean, anl4_qfv4_median_eps, anl4_qfv4_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). std lowish so ts_backfill applied. Kept operators ≤7. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Earnings momentum after a decrease in number of lower estimates
results.description: If number of lower estimations falls while mean rises, positive signal. Used anl4_basicconafv110_down and anl4_qfv4_eps_mean (SUGGESTION1). Down count coverage ~0.7343. No backfill. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Earnings revision vs net profit adjusted trend
results.description: Compare est_eps revisions to est_netprofit_adj to find fundamental support. Used est_eps and est_netprofit_adj (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage; no backfill. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Cashflow surprise persistence across quarters
results.description: Sum of positive CFO surprises over last 4 quarters to find recurring beats. Used cash_flow_from_operations and est_cashflow_op (SUGGESTION1). est coverage moderate; ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Capital expenditure guidance vs realized (capex delta)
results.description: Difference between capex guidance and reported capex predicts margin compression/expansion. Used capital_expenditure_guidance_value and capital_expenditure_reported_value (SUGGESTION1). Guidance low coverage so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Earnings acceleration conditional on analyst unanimity
results.description: When most analysts move up (upper count high relative to total), acceleration is stronger. Used anl4_basicconqfv110_pu and ts_delta(est_eps) (SUGGESTION1). Fields coverage good. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: High guidance to estimate ratio (guidance > estimate) contrarian
results.description: If guidance is much higher than consensus, downside risk exists; compare max_guidance to est_eps. Used max_adjusted_eps_guidance and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Guidance coverage 1.0. Confidence: 0.49

results.idea: Earnings to goodwill trend (profitability vs acquisitions)
results.description: Rising earnings vs rising goodwill may indicate acquisition-driven growth. Used anl4_epsr_mean and anl4_totgw_mean (SUGGESTION1). Totgw coverage ~0.5374 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Analyst estimate count growth vs earnings momentum
results.description: A rising analyst count with accelerating earnings estimates is a strong confirmation. Used anl4_epsr_mean and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage; no backfill. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Earnings down revisions concentration (many lowers)
results.description: High count of lower estimates relative to total signals weakening expectations. Used anl4_basicconafv110_down and anl4_basicconafv110_numest (SUGGESTION1). Coverage good. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Profit margin expansion signal: EBITDA vs sales estimates
results.description: Compare est_ebitda momentum to median sales estimate momentum. Used est_ebitda and median_sales_estimate (SUGGESTION1). Coverage adequate. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: EPS surprise sign persistence (last beat frequency)
results.description: Frequency of positive EPS surprises over trailing year predicts future beat probability. Used anl4_af_eps_value and anl4_qfv4_eps_mean (SUGGESTION1). Implemented as ts_sum of flags; fields have good coverage. Confidence: 0.71

results.idea: Estimate mean momentum filtered by estimate stddev
results.description: Prefer mean momentum when stddev is shrinking: combine ts_delta(est_eps) with negative stddev delta. Used est_eps and anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). Backfilled stddev due to coverage. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Guidance initiation (new guidance) as a momentum trigger
results.description: Use days_from_last_change on guidance-related flags to detect fresh guidance and combine with est_eps change. Used anl4_fsguidanceafv4_item proxy and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). fsguidance coverage ~0.4535 so ts_backfill applied before days_from_last_change. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Cash conversion acceleration (FCF growth vs sales growth)
results.description: Rising free cash flow relative to sales growth indicates improving conversion. Used est_fcf and median_sales_estimate (SUGGESTION1). est_fcf coverage low so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: EBIT surprise scaled by analyst dispersion
results.description: EBIT surprise divided by ebit std to prefer reliable surprises. Used anl4_ebit_value and anl4_ebit_std (SUGGESTION1). ebit_std coverage <0.6 so ts_backfill used. Confidence: 0.70

results.idea: High consensus with low forecast count (thin coverage risk)
results.description: Flag names with high mean but low number of estimates (fragile consensus). Used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Both have high user counts; no backfill. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Vector-style: average of multiple EPS related vector estimates (vec_avg)
results.description: If a field is vector of broker estimates, take vec_avg to reduce idiosyncratic noise. Applied SUGGESTION2 to a plausible vector field anl4_qf_az_eps_mean and combined with est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; vec_avg used. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Rapid change in number of upper forecasts predicts upside
results.description: Use ts_delta(anl4_adxqfv110_pu) to capture bursts of upgrades. SUGGESTION1 used single field for parsimony. Coverage ~0.6979 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Free cash flow per share surprise normalized by shares
results.description: Normalize FCFPS surprise by shares outstanding guidance to adjust for dilution. Used free_cash_flow_per_share and max_shares_outstanding_guidance (SUGGESTION1). FCFPS coverage low so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Earnings mean momentum divided by analyst disagreement
results.description: High mean momentum but low disagreement is robust; used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean and anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). Std backfilled. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Estimate reversion: mean much above recent max (overly optimistic)
results.description: If current mean > recent max by large margin, potential mean reversion. Used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean with ts_max via ts_max_diff operator (SUGGESTION1). Coverage good. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Earnings zscore filtered by analyst-flag recency (trade_when)
results.description: Only trade when forecast type flag recently changed, increases signal relevance. Used anl4_af_eps_value and anl4_epsr_flag (SUGGESTION1). Applied trade_when to gate signal per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Sales estimate surprise scaled by sales std
results.description: Normalize sales surprise by sales estimate std to focus on reliable surprises. Used actual_sales_value_quarterly and sales_estimate_standard_deviation (SUGGESTION1). Std coverage ok; no backfill. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Earnings per share rapid ranking (cross-sectional quantile)
results.description: Rank recent EPS momentum cross-sectionally to pick top quantile. Used ts_delta(est_eps,30) and quantile operator (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; short implementation. Confidence: 0.70

results.idea: Broker upper estimate concentration vs mean
results.description: Ratio of number of upper estimates to mean indicates concentrated optimism. Used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and anl4_qfv4_eps_mean (SUGGESTION1). Coverage acceptable. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Earnings increase with falling debt (net debt trend)
results.description: Rising est_eps paired with falling est_netdebt indicates deleveraging-driven upside. Used est_eps and an est_netdebt (est_netdebt field) (SUGGESTION1). netdebt coverage ~0.5434 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Guidance tightening with rising sales estimates
results.description: Decrease in guidance spread (max-min) while median sales estimate rises signals conviction. Used anl4_afv4_maxguidance/anl4_afv4_minguidance and median_sales_estimate (SUGGESTION1). Applied simple subtract and delta. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Earnings momentum vs num of forecasts missing (coverage risk)
results.description: Use ts_count_nans on est_eps to detect data sparsity; combine with momentum to avoid weak signals. SUGGESTION3 applied if coverage low. Implementation minimal. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: EBITDA surprise persistence normalized by estimate count
results.description: Sum of positive EBITDA surprises weighted by number of estimates to emphasize widely-followed beats. Used anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_ebitda_number (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Earnings estimate reversion when broker upper count drops
results.description: When upper estimations fall sharply while mean still high, expect mean reversion. Used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and anl4_qfv4_eps_mean (SUGGESTION1). Coverage decent. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Cashflow surprise vs capex to spot free cash accelerations
results.description: CFO surprise minus capex trend identifies improving FCF dynamics. Used cash_flow_from_operations and anl4_capex_value (SUGGESTION1). Both fields have acceptable coverage. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Earnings momentum filtered by analyst consensus flag (if_else gating)
results.description: Only take momentum signals if consensus flag indicates revisions (anl4_epsr_flag). Used est_eps and anl4_epsr_flag (SUGGESTION1). Flags have high coverage; used if_else to gate per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Estimate mean stability: low ts_kurtosis suggests reliable estimates
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis on est_eps to prefer stable estimate series (SUGGESTION1). Coverage good; ts_kurtosis applied. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: High recent winsorized EPS momentum
results.description: Winsorize est_eps then compute momentum to avoid outliers. SUGGESTION1 and winsorize used. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Earnings revision zscore scaled by broker rating
results.description: Scale est_eps zscore by broker rating proxy anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue (SUGGESTION1). Rating coverage moderate so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Consensus mean vs reported net income adjusted (quality check)
results.description: Compare est netprofit mean to net_income_adjusted to find quality surprises. Used anl4_netprofit_mean and net_income_adjusted (SUGGESTION1). Both fields decent coverage; no backfill. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Earnings momentum vs book-to-market proxy (bvps)
results.description: Rising earnings momentum with increasing BVPS signals sustainable value creation. Used ts_delta(est_eps) and anl4_bvps_mean (SUGGESTION1). bvps coverage ~0.6499; no backfill. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Estimate disagreement spike preceding volatility
results.description: Use ts_std_dev of est_eps; spikes predict volatility and potential mean reversion. Used est_eps and ts_std_dev (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Earnings momentum relative to tangible book growth
results.description: Combine est_eps momentum with anl4_tbvps_median delta to prefer organic earnings growth. tbvps coverage low (~0.332) so applied ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Rapid increase in upper forecasts per broker (intensity)
results.description: Use vec_avg or vec_sum on broker-level upper counts if available; here use anl4_adxqfv110_pu (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ~0.6979. Simpler single-field intensity. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Earnings revision momentum combined with low reported volatility
results.description: Favor positive estimate revisions when reported earnings volatility low: ts_delta(est_eps) / ts_std_dev(anl4_af_eps_value). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Guidance-to-actual CFO gap
results.description: Compare investing/operating cashflow guidance to actuals to detect cash surprises. Used min_investing_cashflow_guidance and cash_flow_from_investing (SUGGESTION1). guidance coverage 1.0; actual coverage moderate so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Earnings mean breakout after low stddev period
results.description: Detect mean breaking out after a period of low dispersion (quiet consensus then move). Used anl4_qfv4_eps_mean and anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill to std. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Free cash flow per share acceleration normalized by shares
results.description: FCFPS acceleration per share outstanding guidance to find improving per-share cash. Used est_fcf_ps and max_shares_outstanding_guidance (SUGGESTION1). est_fcf_ps low coverage so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum with winsorization
results.description: Winsorize recent EPS surprises then compute momentum to reduce outlier influence (SUGGESTION1). Used anl4_af_eps_value and anl4_qfv4_eps_mean. Confidence: 0.70

results.idea: Analyst stddev vs number of analysts (dispersion per analyst)
results.description: Divide stddev by number of estimates to get per-analyst disagreement. Used anl4_qf_az_dts_spe and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Backfilled std since coverage ~0.571. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Earnings momentum after sustained broker downgrades (contrarian)
results.description: If upper counts fall but earnings estimates remain stable, potential contrarian opportunity. Used anl4_adxqfv110_pu and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ok. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Rapid improvement in net profit adjusted vs mean estimates
results.description: Compare est_netprofit_adj delta to anl4_netprofita_mean to find improving adjustments. Both fields have good coverage per SUGGESTION4. No backfill. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Earnings mean vs last valid previous estimate (kth_element backfill)
results.description: Use kth_element to backfill previous valid estimate and compare for revision magnitude. Used est_eps and anl4_dez1afv4_preest (SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3). kth_element used to ensure recent previous value. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Earnings revision IR (information ratio of revisions)
results.description: Use ts_ir on est_eps to find stable revision signals (SUGGESTION1). Simple two-operator implementation. Confidence: 0.71

results.idea: High recent winsorized stddev decline (reliability increase)
results.description: Winsorize stddev of EPS estimates then detect declines implying growing consensus. Used anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (SUGGESTION1). Applied winsorize and ts_delta. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Earnings momentum relative to reported EBITDA (operational confirmation)
results.description: Combine est_eps momentum with reported ebitda (anl4_ebitda_value) to ensure operational backing for earnings revisions. SUGGESTION1 used; ebitda coverage good. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Analyst count-adjusted EPS surprise (per analyst impact)
results.description: Divide EPS surprise by number of estimates to find per-analyst surprise strength. Used anl4_af_eps_value and anl4_qfv4_eps_number (SUGGESTION1). Count coverage high. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Earnings re-rating potential: rising est_eps with falling net debt
results.description: Combine est_eps delta with decreasing net_debt_mean to prefer deleveraging-driven rerates. Used est_eps and est_netdebt (SUGGESTION1). est_netdebt coverage ~0.5156 so ts_backfill applied. Confidence: 0.62
